name: Djinni
description: A tall, muscular figure with blue skin, adorned in flowing, ethereal garments, and surrounded by swirling winds.
memorable: Known for its charm, wit, and capricious nature, the Djinni is a powerful influencer of weather and air.
goals: Interact with mortals and manipulate the weather.
relations: Rulers of lesser air elementals, often found in palaces of solidified clouds.
environment: Elemental Plane of Air or magnificent cloud palaces.
strengths: Exceptionally high Dexterity, Constitution, and Charisma; strong spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Resistance limited to lightning and thunder; potential vulnerabilities to counterspells.
attacks: Multiattack with scimitar strikes dealing slashing and lightning damage; can unleash a Lightning Blast as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Can create a whirlwind to restrain enemies and control the battlefield.
senses: Blindsight to a range of 120 feet.
skills: High proficiency in Acrobatics, Insight, and Perception, showcasing agility and awareness.
additional_information: Can transform into a Huge cloud form which enhances stealth.
Ability to summon an air elemental as an ally once per day.
Innate spellcaster with access to powerful spells including flight and weather control.
Generates powerful whirlwinds capable of affecting enemy movement.
Can travel to other planes once per day.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a focus on manipulation and control spells like wind walk and major image.
test_queries: muscular air elemental that manipulates weather
elemental creature that summons air elementals
tall blue being with spellcasting abilities
